item.title: Datascience exploration: WTA Height Advantages
item.description: I’ve been playing with Pandas and the Jupyter Notebook to learn how to clean up and extract insights from large datasets. Here’s an example of discovering the relationship between player height and win %. What advantage does height infer in Women’s Tennis? Using dataset: https://www.kaggle.com/joaoevangelista/wta-matches-and-rankings#wta.zip import pandas as pd %matplotlib inline import matplotlib.pyplot as plt df = pd.read_csv('/Users/sam/Downloads/wta/matches.csv', low_memory=False, dtype={ }) df.shape (50577, 33) df.head() .
